name: Crystal Ball
description: A crystal ball with different states.

fields.name: State
fields.description: Defines the current state of the crystal ball.

0.name: Default
0.description: The default state of the crystal ball.

1.name: Held State
1.description: The crystal ball is being held.

2.name: Bug
2.description: The crystal ball is in a bugged state.

3.name: Held State, Carrot
3.description: The crystal ball is held and contains a carrot.
